mapper.select: select bo.no no,bo.title title,us.name name,bo.hit count,bo.reg_date regDate,bo.content content,bo.user_no userNo from board bo,users us where bo.user_no = us.no order by bo.reg_date desc

select bo.no no,bo.title title,us.name name,bo.hit count,bo.reg_date regDate,bo.content content,bo.user_no userNo from board bo,users us where bo.user_no = us.no and title like '%{searchWord}%' order by bo.reg_date desc
select no,title,content,user_no userNo from board where no=#{no}

mapper.update: update board set hit= (select hit+1 from board where no=#{no}) where no=#{no}
